answers.answer: Congratulations on feeling well.  Its good to hear that not everyone gets really ill while on treatment.  I am also geno 1(b) stage 2 and due to start pegasys & ribavirin on May 23rd.I hope I do as well as you.k

Don't mean to burst your bubble, but be prepared for the sx even if you are doing well at this point.  Fatigue is big big thing.  I thought I was exempt but turns out I wasn't.  I'll be taking my 8th this Friday.  Very tired all the time and just found out I have low platelets and have to reduce the peg.  You just really never know but I do wish you the best.Trinity

I suppose not swallowing 1 or 12 Coors Lites every evening for God knows how many yrs. plays a major role, as well as getting my type2 diabetes regulated as to  feeling  so much more energetic now than I have in yrs. I don"t look forward to any of these sides as I"m sure they are in the cards, but to you I wish you the best also and good luck to you on your platelets returning to accepted levels soon. jb

I am sure the sides are in the near future as well as possibly glucose problems as to my Type 2 diabetes. All any of us can due is give it our best prior, during, and post tx to rid our bodys of  HCV and remain that way. I wish you the best  also!

I am in my 9th week of tx and am doing great as well!! I take the 1200mg ribapack and pegasys weekly and am having very few sx at all...I tend to get a little nauseous in the afternoon's but nothing I can't shake off in a couple of hours. I am also geno type one and in stage one and hope and pray it stays this easy...Good luck with everyone's tx and may it all go as well as mine is so far!!!!
well iam on week 36 this friday i did so wel lthem boom it  hit me i hate the weakness more then anything but i work to jobs at retail and vet.. u can do it just have faith and make urself go..

question: I know its early after my first injection last Friday of pegasys and ribasphere 1200mg per day. 47 more to go.  I am a geno 1 and stage 3. I can do this standing on my head,very lucky from what I've read here on this informative forum with, by the way a great bunch of knowledgeable people, as far as sx go. I am keeping my fingers crossed for that 2 load viral drop @ week 12.  I hope everyone success for those that are on treatment and those future tx to rid of HCV as well as myself.  FEELING GOOD SO FAR !! Thanks for listening!
title: Feeling very well so far!
